transformers.description: Electrical transformers at the building site
transformers.notes: Contains a list of transformers that convert electricity from a higher voltage to one used by the building, exterior lighting, and other services at the site.

buildings.notes: Contains a list of buildings on the site (often just one).

calendar.description: Information on the calendar used with the simulation.

schedules.description: Schedules for internal loads, thermostats, equipment operation and control, and any other need.
schedules.notes: Contains a list of schedules used in model.

weather.description: Information on the local weather conditions used with the simulation.

infiltration_pressure_difference.description: Differential pressure difference assumed for infiltration values.
infiltration_pressure_difference.notes: Often 50 Pa or 75 Pa and used as rating conditions for air leakage for a building.

overall_simulation_outputs.description: Outputs from the simluation summed for all buildings in the simulation.

building_rotation_angles.description: A list of angles that building simulations are performed and results are provided.
building_rotation_angles.notes: List of angles that the building has been rotated.

fluid_loops.notes: Contains a list of fluid loops on the site.

conditioning_components.description: Links to all conditioning components used on the site
conditioning_components.notes: Contains a list of fluid loops on the site.

building_segments.description: Large portions of a building that share a building area type
building_segments.notes: Contains a list of building segments in the building.

is_all_new.description: Indicates whether building is completely new construction (true) or existing (false).
is_all_new.notes: Projects that include additions should be False. Projects with additional instead may be modeled as two buildings - one new and one existing, as curtain rules such as baseline fenestration area will apply differently to each portion.

compliance_path.description: Indicates the chosen compliance path if the ruleset has multiple compliance paths such as 90.1 Appendix G has code compliance and beyond code

elevators.notes: Contains a list of elevators in the building.

refrigeration_components.notes: Contains a list of refrigeration components in the building.

open_time.notes: The general time that the building is first opened during normal weekdays from 1 to 24

close_time.notes: The general time that the building is closed during normal weekdays from 1 to 24

thermal_blocks.notes: Contains a list of thermal blocks in the building.

heating_ventilation_air_conditioning_sys.notes: Contains a list of HVAC systems in the building.

service_water_heating_systems.description: Service water heating systems in the building
service_water_heating_systems.notes: Contains a list of service water heating systems in the building.

area_type_vertical_fenestration.description: Building area classification used for vertical fenestration
area_type_vertical_fenestration.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

zones.notes: Contains a list of zones in the building.

served_by_heating_ventilation_air_condit.description: HVAC systems serving the thermal block
served_by_heating_ventilation_air_condit.notes: Contains a list of IDs of the HVAC systems serving the thermal block - from Unique Identification Number in HeatingVentilationAirConditioningSystem.

served_by_service_water_heating_system.description: A service water heating system serving the thermal block
served_by_service_water_heating_system.notes: Contains a single ID of the service water heating system serving the thermal block - from Unique Identification Number in ServiceWaterHeatingSystem.

spaces.notes: Contains a list of spaces in the building.

surfaces.notes: Contains a list of surfaces that define the zone.

infiltration.notes: References a single infiltration data group.

interior_lighting.description: Internal lighting that produce internal gains for a space.

miscellaneous_equipment.description: Miscellaneous equipment loads that produce internal gains for a space.

floor_area.description: The floor area of a space within the building, including basements, mezzanine and intermediate-floored tiers, and penthouses with a headroom height of 7.5 ft or greater. It is measured from the exterior faces of walls or from the center-line of walls separating buildings, but excluding covered walkways, open roofed-over areas, porches and similar spaces, pipe trenches, exterior terraces or steps, chimneys, roof overhangs, and similar features. This is the floor area that is modeled.

number_of_occupants.description: Number of occupants in the space

occupant_multiplier_schedule_name.description: Number of occupant multiplier schedule name

status_type.description: Choice of new, existing, addition, or alteration.

space_function.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

lighting_space_type.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

ventilations_space_type.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

service_water_heating_space_type.description: Service water heating space type classification
service_water_heating_space_type.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

name.description: Name of the Infiltration data group

modeling_method.description: The software methodology chosen for modeling infiltration

air_leakage_rate.description: Air leakage rate from infiltration of outside air
air_leakage_rate.notes: Based on the pressure described in ASHRAE229.infiltration_pressure_difference.

fenestration_subsurfaces.description: Fenestration suburfaces that are on the surface
fenestration_subsurfaces.notes: Contains a list of surfaces that define the space.

classification.notes: Options for surface being interior or exterior wall, floor, or ceiling.

area.notes: Measured from interior face area. It is the gross area of the wall and includes the area of all subsurfaces.

tilt.description: Angle between vertical and the surface outward normal
tilt.notes: Example value would be 0 = roof, 90 = wall, 180 = downward facing surface (exterior floor)

azimuth.description: Clockwise angle between North and the horizontal projection of the wall's outward normal.
azimuth.notes: Example values would be 0 = north, 90 = East, 180 = South, 270 = West

adjacent_to.description: Used to classify the conditions on the surface.
adjacent_to.notes: Determines whether the other side of the surface is modeled and if not what assumptions should be used.

adjacent_space_id.description: ID of the adjacent space for interior surface. Only required when adjacent space is explicity modeled when adjacent_to is set to INTERIOR.

does_cast_shade.description: Determines whether the surface is modeled as casting shade on other exterior surfaces

surface_construction_input_option.description: Identifies whether construction is entered layer-by-layer or simplified (R-value)

fraction_framing.description: Fraction of the construction that is framing.
fraction_framing.notes: Fraction of the construction using framing_layers, the remaining portion uses the primary_layers. If blank, assume zero framing.

primary_layers.description: List of names of layer descriptions starting from the outside surface for primary heat path
primary_layers.notes: For constructions with framing and cavity heat transfer paths, use this for the cavity. For homogeneous constructions, use this element only.

framing_layers.description: List of names of layer descriptions starting from the outside surface for the framing heat path
framing_layers.notes: For constructions with framing and cavity heat transfer paths, use this for the framing. For homogeneous constructions, do not use this element.

insulation_location.description: The location of the insulation related to the surface

u_factor.notes: Includes interior and exterior air films as specified by the referenced standard.

r_value.description: r-value of the insulation for the surface

thickness.description: The thickness of the material layer

thermal_conductivity.description: The thermal conductivity of the material layer

density.description: The density of the material layer

specific_heat.description: The specific heat of the material layer

absorptance_thermal_exterior.description: Thermal absorptance of long wavelength radiation on the exterior surface.

absorptance_solar_exterior.description: Thermal absorptance of short wavelength radiation on the exterior surface.

absorptance_visible_exterior.description: Thermal absorptance of visible radiation on the exterior surface.

absorptance_thermal_interior.description: Thermal absorptance of long wavelength radiation on the interior surface.

absorptance_solar_interior.description: Thermal absorptance of short wavelength radiation on the interior surface.

absorptance_visible_interior.description: Thermal absorptance of visible radiation on the interior surface.

descriptions: Exterior wall or roof which is adjacent to the exterior environment.
Slab-on-grad or below grade surface if adjacent to ground.
Interior surface if adjacent to another space which is explicity modeled.

Surface adjacent to a environment identical to the space. Sometimes this is described as adiabatic surface since no heat is transfered. The space on the other side of the surface is not explicity modeled.
The surface adjacency cannot be determined by the software.
Construction is entered by R-value only.

classification.description: Classification for the fenestration being window, skylight, door.

is_operable.description: Identifies whether fenestration can be opened and closed including by pivoting or sliding.

glazed_area.description: Area of fenestration including glass and transparent surfaces

opaque_area.description: Area of fenestration framing for a window or skylight or opaque portion for a door.

u_factor.notes: Includes interior and exterior air films as specified by the referenced standard.

depth_of_overhang.description: Distance from the edge of the overhang to the fenestration surface.

has_manual_interior_shades.description: Are there manually-operated interior shading such as blinds, curtains or shades

solar_transmittance_multiplier_summer.notes: Often used to account for interior shading such as drapes.

solar_transmittance_multiplier_winter.notes: Often used to account for interior shading such as drapes.

has_automatic_shades.description: Are there automatic interior shading such as blinds, curtains or shades

id.description: Unique ID assigned to each interior lighting fixture(s) reported in an RMR

purpose_type.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

power_per_area.description: Total power for lights divided by the area of the space.
power_per_area.notes: When computing the power per area use the area of the entire space.

has_occupancy_control.description: Indicates that the lighting has occupancy controls

id.description: Unique ID assigned to each interior miscellaneous equipment in an RMR

energy_type.description: Source of energy for the miscelleous equipment in the space

peak_usage.description: Peak energy usage per hour by the miscelleous equipment in the space.

multiplier_schedule_name.description: miscelleous equipment in the space multiplier schedule name

sensible_fraction.description: Fraction of energy that is a sensible load on the space.
sensible_fraction.notes: Sensible plus latent do not necessarily add up to 1.0.

latent_fraction.description: Fraction of energy that is a latent load on the space.
latent_fraction.notes: Sensible plus latent do not necessarily add up to 1.0.

has_automatic_control.description: Indicates that the receptacles have automatic controls

efficiency.notes: Expresses the efficiency of the transformer as a fraction from 0 to 1, where 1 would represent 100% efficiency.

peak_load.description: Annual Peak electric load on the transformer
peak_load.notes: Peak electric load on the transfomer based on an annual simulation with typical weather file.

purpose.notes: Describe the purpose of the schedule and how it can be used. Not an enumerations. The purpose assigned by BEM tool should match across RMRs. Examples include thermostat, multiplier for lighting, availability for equipment.

hourly_values.notes: Used when schedule_sequence_type is HOURLY. Can also use functions like EFLH(), MAX(), MIN() to determine overall characteristics for the list of schedule values.

event_times.description: Event times when the schedule changes
event_times.notes: Used when schedule_sequence_type is EVENT to describe the time of the year in seconds that the schedule changes value.

event_values.description: Event value at corresponding event time.
event_values.notes: Used when schedule_sequence_type is EVENT. New values starting at corresponding to the event time until following event time minus one second. Can also use functions like EFLH(), MAX(), MIN() to determine overall characteristics for the list of schedule values.

type.notes: Primarily indicates if the values may be represented by units such as C for temperature or W for power or m3/s for flow rate or are dimensionless multipliers.

prescribed_schedule.description: True if any schedule values have changed from what appears in the schedule library

is_schedule_modified_for_workaround.description: True if any schedule has been modified for a workaround

day_of_week_for_january_1.description: Day of the week for January 1

is_leap_year.description: The schedules assume it is a leap year

is_daylight_savings_time.description: The schedules adjust for daylight Savings Time

name.description: Name of the Weather data group

climate_zone.description: The designation of the climate zone where the building is located
climate_zone.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

design_elevator_load.description: Elevator load at which to operate

cab_motor_multiplier_schedule.description: Elevator motor operation multiplier schedule name

cab_ventilation_fan_multiplier_schedule.description: Elevator ventilation fan operation mulitplier schedule name

zones_served.description: List of the zones served by the HVAC system

simulation_result_sensible_cool_capacity.description: Result from the simulation of the sensible cooling capacity
simulation_result_sensible_cool_capacity.notes: If multiple values are provided, they correspond to rotated building orientations

simulation_result_heat_capacity.description: Result from the simulation of the heating capacity
simulation_result_heat_capacity.notes: If multiple values are provided, they correspond to rotated building orientations

name.description: Name of the fluid loop connecting primary and secondary equipment in the plant

child_loops.description: Other fluid loops connected to this one as children.

name.description: Name of the fluid loop design and control.

is_sized_using_coincident_load.description: True if the loop is sized based on coincident load

minimum_flow_fraction.description: Minimum fraction of full flow allowed

operation.description: Type of operation used by loop

temperature_reset_type.description: Type of temperature reset used by loop

outdoor_high_for_loop_supply_temperature.description: Outdoor high for loop supply temp reset

outdoor_low_for_loop_supply_temperature_.description: Outdoor low for loop supply temp reset

loop_supply_temperature_at_outdoor_high.description: Loop supply temperature at outdoor high temperature

loop_supply_temperature_at_outdoor_low.description: Loop supply temperature at outdoor low temperature

specification_method.description: Options for how the pump is specified

power.notes: Only used when specification_method is set to Simple

motor_nameplate_power.notes: Only used when specification_method is set to Detailed

design_head.description: Head of the pump at design flow conditions
design_head.notes: Only used when specification_method is set to Detailed

impeller_efficiency.description: Full load efficiency of the impeller
impeller_efficiency.notes: Only used when specification_method is set to Detailed

motor_efficiency.description: Full load efficiency of the pump motor
motor_efficiency.notes: Only used when specification_method is set to Detailed

is_variable_speed.description: True if variable speed drive such a VFD

notes: Specify the electric power input of pump
Specify the motor nameplate power, design head, impelllor efficiency, motor efficiency

minimum_load_ratio.description: Minimum fraction of full load allowed

efficiency_metric_type.description: The type of efficiency metric used

efficiency_metric.notes: Enter the efficiency value based on the selected efficiency_metric_type

detailed_performance.description: Detailed performance as specified in ASHRAE Standard 205
detailed_performance.notes: Reserved for referencing after ASHRAE Standard 205 is published.

energy_validation_points.notes: Load is input to each validation point and energy output is the result.

auxiliary_power.notes: Power for boiler pump, combustion fan, or other auxiliary that operates when boiler operates.

operation_lower_limit.description: Heating load range operation, lower limit

operation_upper_limit.description: Heating load range operation, upper limit

load.notes: No name and id is needed since typically used as one of a series.

condensing_loop_name.notes: No condensing loop name implies air-cooled chiller.

minimum_load_ratio.description: Minimum fraction of full load allowed

full_load_efficiency.description: Full Low Efficiency expressed as a coefficient of performance (COP)

integrated_part_load_value_efficiency.description: Integrated part load value efficiency expressed as a coefficient of performance (COP)
integrated_part_load_value_efficiency.notes: Can be input by user or computed.

detailed_performance.description: Detailed performance as specified in ASHRAE Standard 205
detailed_performance.notes: Reserved for referencing after ASHRAE Standard 205 is published.

chilled_water_supply_temperature.notes: No name and id is needed since used as one of a series.

second_temperature.notes: Outside air dry-bulb temperature for air cooled chillers and condenser water temperature for water cooled chillers

descriptions: Closed-circuit cooling tower or fluid cooler

name.notes: External fluid source is a method to indicate that it is connected to a district or campus system external to the building.

name.description: Name of service water heating system loop

area_type.description: Service Water Heating Loop Area Type
area_type.notes: The enumeration is based on the standard used.

design_flow.description: Design Flowrate of service water heating loop

supply_temperature.description: Design supply temperature setpoint of service water heating loop

flow_multiplier_schedule.description: service water heating Loop flow muliplier schedule name

annual_entering_water_temperature.description: Annual service main or annual ground temperature used for service water heating calculations entering water temperature	degrees

monthly_entering_water_temperature.description: Monthly service main or ground temperatures used for service water heating entering water temperature	degrees
monthly_entering_water_temperature.notes: Arrayed variable with 12 values for monthly entering water temperature

entering_water_temperature_type.description: Method of determining service water heating entering water temperature

heater_fuel_type.description: Service water heating heater fuel type

descriptions: Annual main entering water temperature option
Monthly main entering water temperature option
Annual ground entering water temperature option
Monthly ground entering water temperature option

id.description: Unique ID assigned to each exterior lighting fixture(s) reported in an RMR

type.description: The type of exterior lighting fixture	none

area.description: Area of the exterior functional space.

norminal_wattage.description: Nominal capacity of exterior lighting fixtures

power.description: Total exterior lighting power of all fixtures in a specific functional area

designed_power.description: Total designed exterior lighting power of all fixtures in a specific functional area

trade_light_power.description: Exterior Lighting power for tradable surface

non_trade_light_power.description: Exterior Lighting power for non-tradable surface

tradable_surface_type.description: Type of tradable surfaces for exterior lighting

has_walkway.description: If the building has an exterior walkway

energy_per_day.description: Rated electrical energy use per day

case_volume.description: volume of a refrigerated case in cubic meters

total_display_area.description: display area of a refrigerated case in square meters

name.description: Name of the overall simulation output

refrigeration_energy_enduse.description: Annual refrigeration energy end use from simulation output

service_water_heating_annual_enduse_elec.description: Annual electricity energy end_use for SWH loops

service_water_heating_annual_enduse_foss.description: Annual fossil fuel energy end_use for SWH loops
